title: hh.ru Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job vacancies from hh.ru, Russia's leading job search platform. Search by keywords, location, experience level, and schedule type. Supports detailed scraping with full job descriptions.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific hh.ru search URL. If provided, this will override other search parameters.

text.title: Search Keywords
text.description: Job title, skill, or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Python Developer', 'Data Analyst', 'Marketing Manager').

area.title: Region/Area ID
area.description: Region code: 1=Moscow, 2=Saint Petersburg, 113=Russia, 4=Novosibirsk, etc. Leave empty for all regions.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to scrape complete job descriptions from detail pages. Disable for faster results with basic info only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs to Collect
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job vacancies to scrape. Set higher for comprehensive results.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Crawl
max_pages.description: Safety limit for the number of search result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for accessing hh.ru. Recommended to use residential proxies for reliable access.
